summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EcoSayahat platform MVP - Backend APIs 100% functional, Frontend working with minor AI assistant interaction issue

ui_bugs.issue: AI Assistant button not clickable due to Emergent badge overlay intercepting pointer events
ui_bugs.workaround: Move badge to different z-index or position

design_issues.issue: Language dropdown present but selector tests couldn't interact with it reliably

passed_tests: Backend: All 24 API endpoints passing (100% success rate)
Backend: User registration/login for all roles (tourist, taxi_driver, admin)
Backend: JWT authentication and protected routes
Backend: AI Assistant API working (Gemini 3 Flash integration)
Backend: Task submission with image processing
Backend: Admin statistics and review moderation APIs
Frontend: User registration and authentication flow
Frontend: Tourist dashboard with all 6 tabs (Maps, Attractions, Eco-taxi, Hotels, Tasks, About)
Frontend: Leaflet maps integration with geolocation markers
Frontend: Taxi driver dashboard with orders and charging stations map
Frontend: Admin dashboard with statistics cards and moderation interface
Frontend: Beautiful green/white theme as specified
Frontend: All role-specific dashboards loading correctly

action_item_for_main_agent.issue: Fix AI Assistant button clickability - Emergent badge overlay preventing interaction
action_item_for_main_agent.solution: Adjust z-index or position of floating badge to not interfere with AI Assistant button
Add more specific data-testid attributes to language dropdown components
